name: World Tank Combat Pro
description:
Get ready for a thrilling adventure in the world of epic tank battles, mortal combats and face­to­face encounters with your enemies.
World Tank Combat Pro Features:
— over 95 tank models from М26 to “Black Eagle”;- up to 16 players in each battle;
— 10 battle maps with hills, constructions, rivers, open plains, ravines and trees;
— high­quality 3D graphics and real­time team battles;
— unique camouflage and various kinds of armaments;
